attributes.action: Have nation wide parades on Talk Like A Pirate Day. (A major holiday for all Pastafarians)
attributes.additional_details: We would like recognition of our religion and for it to be celebrated on the 19th of September every year with parades of colourful ships and mateys. I take my beliefs very seriously and am appalled at how over looked we are. I believe this could be a great chance for us to publicly express our faith. I hope this petition is taken into serious consideration.
